transitionTo.code:
AK.playAnimation(
        {
            object: AK.getObjectByID(currObject),
            anim: 'coin_pick',
            onStart: "  AK.getObjectByID(currObject).setOption('isCollidable',false);",
            onFinish: "  AK.removeObject(  AK.getObjectByID(currObject));"
        })
